docs.snippet: Two Houston taxpayers, backed by Texas Republican leaders, on Wednesday challenged Houston's spousal benefits for same-sex couples, asking the state's highest civil court to re-examine parts of a landmark 2015 U.S. Supreme Court ruling that legali...
docs.lead_paragraph: Two Houston taxpayers, backed by Texas Republican leaders, on Wednesday challenged Houston's spousal benefits for same-sex couples, asking the state's highest civil court to re-examine parts of a landmark 2015 U.S. Supreme Court ruling that legalized gay marriage.

headline.main: Texas Supreme Court Hears Challenge on Same-Sex Marriage Rights
headline.print_headline: Texas Supreme Court Hears Challenge on Same-Sex Marriage Rights
